name: PROTHRIN
feature: Prothrin is formulated using a combination of two active ingredients namely Profenofos 40% and Cypermethrin 4% EC. Prothrin is a topical and enteric insecticide. It is effective against many pests (chewing and sucking). Prothrin acts as an anthelmintic. Excellent control to kill bollworms. The penetrative action of prothrin kills insects on the lower and upper surfaces of leaves.
pests: bollworms

name: WAR 505
feature: War (Chlorpyrifos 50% + Cypermethrin 5% EC) is a combination insecticide of two active ingredients, Chlorpyrifos and Cypermethrin. It is a topical and topical insecticide. It is a broad spectrum insecticide and poison is produced by contact as well as by vapor action in the stomach. Their combination provides synergistic action to provide long-lasting protection.
pests: Pink bollworm, American bollworm, thrips, whitefly

name: JAWA
feature: JAWA (Thiamethoxam 25% Wg) is a granular soluble insecticide. It protects against insects for longer than other insecticides. JAWA is highly effective at low doses against a wide spectrum of sap-sucking insects, soil and foliar insects. JAWA is highly systematic and therefore suitable for application through spray, drench or drip irrigation.
crops: Cotton, Rice, Mango, Wheat, Okra, Mustard, Tomato, Potato, Mossambi, Eggplant.
pests: thrips, moth, whitefly, stem borer, hopper, mosquito bug, thrips.

name: JAWA PLUS
feature: JAWA Plus (Thymethoxam 30% FS) is an intercurrent insecticide. JAWA Plus works on various insect activity sites. JAWA Plus is used as a seed dresser. JAWA Plus provides control of a wide range of leaf-chewing, leaf-eating and soil-dwelling pests such as aphids, wireworms, flea beetles and leaf miners.
crops: Chilli, Cotton, Okra, Maize, Sorghum, Wheat, Soybean, Sunflower.
pests: thrips, mites, maggots, shoot fly, whitefly.

name: FLY-KILL
feature: Flykill (Acetamiprid 20% SP) is a soluble powder formulation. It has a unique translaminar characteristic, it survives in crops and thus has the ability to control long-hidden pests. It is a very effective insecticide.
pests: mealybugs, whiteflies, maggots, thrips.

name: ENJOCLAIM
feature: Enjoclaim (Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG) is a modern insecticide of the Avermectin group. Enjnclaim is a popular multi-purpose soluble granular insecticide. Enzoclam has a remarkable translaminar action by which it controls the larvae on the lower surface of leaves. Worms stop damaging crops 2 hours after applying EnjoClaim.
crops: Cotton, Cauliflower, Gram, Grapes, Okra, Chilli, Cabbage, Onion, Eggplant.
pests: Bollworm, thrips, pod borer, shoot and fruit borer.

name: SHOTGUN
feature: Shotgun is a water soluble liquid formulation containing Emamectin Benzoate 1.9% EC as the active ingredient, recommended for bollworm control in cotton. It is a stomach poison insecticide. When the larvae come in contact with the shotgun along with the food, the affected larvae become paralyzed and immediately stop eating and then die after 2-4 days.
pests: bollworms, mites, maggots

name: ACP
feature: ACP (Fipronil 40% + Imidacloprid 40% WG) is an intermittent and topical insecticide, containing 400 g of Fipronil and 400 g of Imidacloprid as active ingredients, per kg of formulation
pests: Humani worms

name: VAJEER
feature: Vajeer (Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% w/w SC) is a plant systemic insecticide that belongs to the group anthranilic diamide,which has a unique mode of action called Ryanodine Receptor Activators that disrupt normal muscle functions within the pest
crops: soybeans, Pigen Pea, Black Gram, Cotton,Brinjal, Cabbage, Chilli, Groundnut,Maize, Okra, Rice, Sugarcane
pests: Pod Borer, American Boll Worm,Spotted Bollworm Fruit Borers & Caterpillars, Termite Early Shoot Borer And Top Borer Stem Borer, Leaf Borer

name: ENJOGUARD PLUS
feature: EnjoGuard Plus with Chlorpyrifos 50% EC is used to control stem borer and leaf roller in rice and bollworms in buildings, during construction and in cotton crops
pests: Bollworm, stem borer and leaf licker

name: LALISA
feature: Lalisa (Buprofezin 15% + Acephate 35% WP) is an effective pre-mix insecticide of buprofezin and acephate and is a unique combination product with two distinct actions. It acts as a regulator of insect growth and at the same time affects the nervous system of insects by inhibiting the transmission of messages through the disruption of acetylcholine
pests: whitefly, thrips, thrips

name: E-MIDA
feature: E-Mida Super contains the ingredient IMIDACLOPRID 30.5% SC. It is a systemic intravenous and topical insecticide with enteric action. E-Mida Super is easily absorbed by the leaf and diffuses into all parts.
pests: hoppers, thrips, moths, whiteflies, whiteflies, brown thrips, white-backed thrips

name: ENJONEEM
feature: Enjoneem is a neem-based biopesticide, containing 3,000 ppm azadirectin, used both prophylactically and as a tank mix spray to control sucking and chewing insects, including mites.
ingredients: Neem kernel based EC Containing Azadirachtin 0.3% (3000 ppm)
crops: Flowers, Pomegranate, Chilli, Tomato, Cotton, Grapes, Watermelon, Onion, Cabbage, Ornamentals.
pests: Early instars of whiteflies, thrips, moths, moths, mites, fruit borers.

name: ENJONEEM PLUS
feature: Enjoneem Plus is a neem based biopesticide with a blend of 10,000 ppm azadirachtin and neem oil, which provides all liminoids for effective insecticidal action. It is effective against sucking and chewing insects including mites. The product is suitable for use in integrated pest management (IPM) and pest resistant management (IRM) programs, with multiple modes of action.
ingredients: Neem kernel based EC Containing Azadirachtin 1% (10000 ppm)
crops: Flowers, Pomegranate, Chilli, Tomato, Cotton, Grapes, Watermelon, Onion, Cabbage, Mango, Okra, Eggplant, Mossambi, Ornamentals.
pests: Whiteflies, thrips, moths, moths, mites, fruit borers, mealybugs, flea beetles, armyworms.

name: E-MIDA SUPER
feature: E-Mida Super contains the ingredient IMIDACLOPRID 30.5% SC. It is a systemic intravenous and topical insecticide with enteric action. E-Mida Super is easily absorbed by the leaf and diffuses into all parts.
pests: hoppers, thrips, moths, whiteflies, whiteflies, brown thrips, white-backed thrips

name: ENJOFYRE
feature: Enjofyre contains Imidacloprid 70% WG as an intercurrent insecticide, it is very effective against various pests and is safe for plants, Enzo-Fire is absorbed faster by plants and spreads better resulting in better efficacy.
pests: hoppers, thrips, moths, thrips.

name: JAWA POWER
feature: JAWA Power is a broad spectrum intercurrent insecticide containing Thiamethoxam 75% SG as the active ingredient. JAWA Power is an instant solution to soil-sucking insects and chewing insects. JAWA Power improves plants from primary treatment and leads to higher yields. It has negligible effect on beneficial insects.
pests: Weevil, early shoot borer, green leaf hopper, brown plant hopper, thrips, thrips.

name: AAKI
feature: Aaki (Lambda Cyhalothrin 9.5% + Thiamethoxam 12.6% ZC) is an intercurrent and topical insecticide, a new innovative formulation ZC (combination of CS and SC formulations), an excellent for proper start of crop with effective control of sucking insects. The yield is. A better crop overall and a greener crop with more branch flowers.
crops: Cotton, Maize, Chilli, Groundnut, Soybean, Tomato
pests: Whitefly, thrips, thrips, bollworm, stem fly, fruit borer, mava, leaf folder

name: ENJOGUARD
crops: Cotton, Soybean, Gram, Barley, Rice, Mossambi, Cabbage, Onion, Eggplant
pests: Bollworm, Cutworm, Cutworm, Whitefly, Weevil, Hispa, Stem Borer, Shoot and Fruit Borer, Diamond Backmoth.
feature: Enjoguard with Chorpyriphos 20 %EC is a broad spectrum organophosphorus insecticide. It controls a wide range of soil or foliar pests in a variety of crops, by contact, ingestion and vapor action. Enzogard is used for the control of sucking and chewing insects.

name: PROPHOS
feature: Prophos with Profenofos 50% EC is an intercurrent and topical insecticide. After the insect feeds on the plant or crawls onto the treated leaf, the insect first becomes paralyzed and then quickly dies. Profos works to control insects that normally hide under the underside of leaves. Broad spectrum also controls all sucking insects and leaf-eating larvae.
pests: bollworms, thrips, maggots.

name: Thripkill plus
feature: Thripkill plus ( Tolfenpyrad 15% EC) is a topical insecticide. It is highly effective against a wide range of sucking insects and chewing insects (diamond back moth). Thripkill plus acts as a one shot solution for multiple target pests and also reduces the cost of crop protection
pests: Whiteflies, Thrips, Aphids, Plant Hoppers, Diamond Backmoths

name: ABAJIN
feature: Abajin is an insecticide containing Abamectin 1.9% EC as the active ingredient. It is effective against a wide range of insects and is suitable for use on various crops.
pests: yellow mites, red mites, red spiders, two-spotted mites

name: ENJOGUARD-DP
feature: Enjoguard DP (Chloropyrifos 1.5% DP) is in powder form and when it comes in contact with insects, it slows their respiration and kills the insects. It is useful against stem borer, green leaf hopper, brown plant hopper, gall midge and grass hopper in rice crop.
pests: Borer, stem borer and leaf roller, thrips.

name: CHLORONEX 10 G
feature: Chloronex (chlorpyrifos 10% gr) is used early in the insect life cycle, Chloronex inhibits the growth of insect populations and increases crop yield potential. Chloronex inhibits rice root weevils, and all types of soil-borne pests such as whiteflies.
crops: Rice, wheat, sugarcane, vegetable crops, groundnut, cotton and soybeans.
pests: Stem Borer, Gall Midge, Rice Hispa, Humani

name: SECTOR
feature: Sector (Acephate 45% + Cypermethrin 5% DF) is a broad-spectrum topical and enteric insecticide against aphids, jasids, thrips, and bollworms in cotton. controls it
pests: bollworms, mealybugs, maggots, thrips

name: ACEIMIDA
feature: Aceimida (Acephate 50% + Imidacloprid 1.8% SP) is formulated to provide cost effective control of several pests to vegetable growers. It is a combination of two systemic insecticides from different classes. Asmida is a good defense against sap-sucking insects
pests: Whiteflies, thrips, thrips, bollworms

name: ACELEX
feature: Acilex (Acephate 75% SP) is a systemic insecticide that controls pests by contact and stomach action. It mainly acts on the nervous system of target insects. Acelex remains effective for a long period of time and thus provides protection for a long period of time
pests: stem borer, thrips, bollworm

name: FIPRONEX
feature: Fipronex (Fipronil 5% SC) is an intravenous and topical insecticide. It provides low dose, highly effective pest control against a wide range of important pests. It has also been found to be particularly effective for the management of thrips. Fipronil helps increase crop yields by controlling pests that slow crop growth.
pests: Whitefly, thrips, thrips, bollworm, green leaf hopper, stem borer, leaf folder, brown plant hopper, diamond back moth, fruit borer, root borer

name: RETAINZA
feature: Fipronil 2.92% w/w Emulsifiable Concentrate (EC) is recommended for the control of termites in buildings through pre & post construction treatments
pests: termites

name: FENPROTOL
feature: Fenpropathrin 10 % EC is the active ingredient in Fenpropathol and is a pyrethroid insecticide with a high degree of acaricidal-insecticidal activity. It acts on the nervous system of insects and kills the insects
pests: American bollworm, pink bollworm

name: FIPRONEX PLUS
feature: Fipronex Plus (Fipronil 80 % WG) is a fipronil-based phenyl pyrazole insecticide. Fipronil not only effectively controls pests but also has effects on plant growth leading to higher yields as well as being effective against major pests at low dose rates.
crops: grapes, cotton, onion, chilli, cabbage, rice.
pests: thrips, stem borer, leaf folder, diamond back moth.

name: CYPETHION
feature: Cypethion (Ethion 40% + Cypermethrin 5% EC) is a combination insecticide that provides effective control against a wide range of pests. Ethion and Cypermethrin act on the nervous system of insects, leading to their elimination.
crops: grapes, cotton, onion, chilli, cabbage, rice
pests: thrips, stem borer, leaf folder, diamond back moth

name: ENJOTSU
feature: Enjotsu (Clothianidin 50% WG) is an insecticide that provides effective control against a wide range of pests. It is formulated with Clothianidin, which acts on the nervous system of insects, leading to their elimination.
pests: Jassids, Aphids, Whitefly, Leaf Hoppers, Mealybug etc

name: RAFEL
feature: Rafel (Pyriproxyfen 8% + Dinotefuran 5% + Diafenthiuron 18% SC) is a combination insecticide that provides effective control against a wide range of pests. Pyriproxyfen, Dinotefuran, and Diafenthiuron act on the nervous system of insects, leading to their elimination.
pests: whitefly, jassids, thrips and Aphids

name: VAJEER GR
feature: Vajeer GR (Chlorantraniliprole 0.4% GR) is an insecticide that provides effective control against a wide range of pests. It is formulated with Chlorantraniliprole, which acts on the nervous system of insects, leading to their elimination.
pests: Yellow stem borer, Leaf folder,Early shoot borer

name: DIEFENOX
feature: Difenox (Diafenthiuron 50% WP) is an intermittent and topical insecticide that controls insects as well as mites. It has a trans-laminar action, which can control insects hiding in the canopy and underside of leaves. It has vapor action so works well in dense crops and large fields
crops: eggplant, cotton, potato, chilli, cabbage, lemon
pests: Whitefly, thrips, thrips, mites, capsule borer

name: METALEX
feature: Metalex (Metalaxyl 35% WS) is a systemic, phenylamide intermittent fungicide with protective and curative activity. Recommended as a spray on tropical and sub-tropical crops, also as a drench for control of soil-borne pathogens and as a seed treatment for fungal control.
pests: die blight, downy mildew, powdery mildew, white rust.
crops: Mustard, Maize, Cabbage, Flower, Sunflower, Tobacco, Tomato, Eggplant, Okra, Chilli, Potato, Cucumber.

name: THIPHONEX
feature: Thiphonex (Thiphonate Methyl 70 % WP) is a broad spectrum enteric fungicide and has a unique combination of preventive, curative and systemic fungicidal properties. Anthoceros, Cercospora leaf spot, Powdery mildew, Venturia scab, Fusarium, Bosrotinia, are successfully treated with Thiphonex.
dosage: 200 gm. per acre, Spraying - Spray 250 grams per acre. (0.5 g/liter of water), Seed treatment - 2 to 3 g/kg seed, Drinching- 2 to 4 g/L of water.
pests: powdery mildew, fruit rot, wilt, stem rot, leaf spot, black scurf,Tuber decay, tuber rot.

name: ENJOTAF PLUS
feature: Enjotaf Plus (Hexaconazole 5% SC) is a unique topical fungicide. Enjotaf Plus is a broad-spectrum fungicide that controls a wide range of diseases affecting many crops. Enjotaf Plus provides excellent control of Anscomycetes, Basidomycetes and Deuteromycetes. Enjotaf Plus is a safe fungicide with low toxicity to mammals, fish, birds and natural enemies.
pests: Sheath Blight, Powdery Mildew.

name: PROPINEX
feature: Propiconazole (Propiconazole 25% EC) is an intermittent fungicide of the triazole group. Propinex is indicated for the control of a wide range of leaf and stem diseases in cereals. Propinex has both curative and protective action, so the plant effectively controls diseases. Propinex has a long-lasting effect, thus controlling diseases for a long period of time. Application of propinex in rice prevents black spot.
pests: brown rust, black rust, yellow rust, tick disease, black rot.

name: TESLA
feature: Tesla (Tebuconazole 10% + Sulfur 65%) is an effective mix fungicide with protective, and eradication action. It controls powdery mildew, fruit rot disease of chilli and leaf spot, pod blight disease of soybean. Effective and cost-effective remedy for fungal diseases. Instant and uniform solubility. Good yield and quality with phytotonic effect.
pests: leaf spot and pod blight, powdery mildew, fruit rot.

name: UNIXX
feature: Unixx is a high quality fungicide containing Azoxystrobin 11% and Tebuconazole 18.3% SC components. It inhibits fungal respiration and ergosterol synthesis. Unix is a powerful combination of triazole and strobilurin chemicals that rapidly penetrate the plant system and kill fungal cells
crops: Grapes, Rice, Potato, Chilli, Tomato, Wheat, Onion.
pests: Downy mildew, powdery mildew, sheath spot, purple spot, yellow rust

name: THERI
feature: Theri (Carbendazim 12% + Mencozeb 63% WP) is a high quality intercurrent and topical fungicide. Theri is recommended on various crops for the control of many diseases. Theri is a preventive, curative and cost-effective fungicide with multi-site action on fungi
crops: grapes, rice, potato, chilli, maize, mango, groundnut
pests: Downy mildew, powdery mildew, sheath blight, fruit rot, tick disease

name: CABTEB
feature: Cabteb (Tebuconazole 6.7% + Captan 26.9% SC) is a powerful fungicide with a unique combination of active ingredients. It provides effective control against a wide range of fungal diseases in various crops. Capteb exhibits both preventive and curative properties, offering protection against diseases and stopping their spread. With its excellent formulation, Capteb ensures optimal coverage and adherence to plant surfaces, maximizing its efficacy. It is easy to use and provides long-lasting protection, contributing to healthier and higher-yielding crops.
pests: Powdery mildew, Alternaria blight, Anthracnose

name: ANEX M-45
feature: Anex M-45 (Mancozeb 75% WP) is a topical fungicide, which inhibits the growth of fungi and the spread of diseases. It reduces the activity of enzymes in the fungus which leads to reduced energy production and ultimately death of the fungus. It is used in many crops for spraying, nursery drenching and seed treatment. In addition to disease control, it also provides manganese and zinc to crops, keeping plants green and healthy. Compared to other fungicides, it is less expensive in the long run due to its nutritional benefits and superior crop protection, leading to higher yields and better quality
crops: grapes, rice, potato, potato, groundnut, chili, tomato
pests: rust, downy mildew, early blight, late blight, fruit spot,Brown and black rust, Tikka

name: ENJOTAF POWER
feature: Enzotaf Power (HEXACONAZOLE 75%WG ) is a spectrum, intermittent triazole fungicide, with protective, curative, eradication and antisporulant activity. Hexaconazole is a sterol biosynthesis inhibitor. It controls a wide range of foliar and soil-borne (ascomycetes and basidiomycetes) diseases.
pests: powdery mildew, leaf spot, tick.

name: PROPINOCOL
feature: Characteristics and Benefits- Propinocol (Propineb 70% WP) is a fungicide that works against various crop diseases. Propinocol is anti-resistant due to its special mechanism of action. .Propincol is a polymeric zinc containing dithiocarbamate, due to its zinc content, application of propinocol has a greening effect on the crop and subsequent improvement in yield quality
crops: Grapes, Rice, Potato, Pomegranate, Chilli, Tomato
pests: Scab, Downy Mildew, Early Blight, Late Blight, Buck Eye Rot

name: TEBUNEX
feature: Tebunex contains Tebuconazole 25.9 EC. It is a systemic triazole fungicide. Triazoles are the leading chemical class of fungicides worldwide. Tabunex offers an effective solution to a wide spectrum of diseases in many crops through protective, curative and eradication action. Application of Tebunex has a greening effect on the leaves of the crop
pests: blast, sheath blight, powdery mildew, fruit rot tikka and rust, purple spot

name: COPTIVA
feature: Coptiva (copper oxychloride 50% WP) is a copper based broad spectrum fungicide which controls fungal as well as bacterial diseases through its contact action. Due to its fine particles, it adheres to the leaves and helps prevent fungal growth. Copexa releases copper ions slowly, allowing it to control the disease for a longer period of time. Gives thickness to the leaves and provides copper nutrition to the crop. Suitable fungicide during hail/rain
crops: Grapes, Bananas, Potatoes, Potatoes, Chillies, Tomatoes, Mossambi
pests: rust, downy mildew, early blight, late blight, fruit spot, leaf spot, canker

name: ENJOSULF POWER
feature: Enjosulf Power (Sulphur 80% WDG) is a powerful fungicide that provides effective control against various fungal diseases. It contains a high concentration of sulfur, which acts as a contact fungicide, inhibiting the growth and spread of fungi. Enjosulf Power is suitable for use on a wide range of crops and offers both preventive and curative action against diseases. It is easy to use and provides long-lasting protection, contributing to healthier and higher-yielding crops.
pests: Powdery mildew

name: LUKA GLO
feature: Luca Glow (Azoxystrobin 8.3% + Mancozeb 66.7% WDG) is an excellent intercurrent and topical fungicide that provides excellent disease control with remarkable phytotonic benefits.
pests: Downy mildew, powdery mildew, leaf spot

name: CROP CARE
feature: Crop Care ( azoxystrobin 2.5 + thiophanate methyl 11.25 + thiamethoxam 25% fs ) It is a high quality intercurrent insecticide and intercurrent fungicide . It controls seed and soil borne diseases and protects the crop from fast absorbing pests and diseases.
ingredients: Humic acid-5000 ppm, C vid- 2000 ppm.
pests: Downy mildew, powdery mildew, sheath spot, fruit rot, tick disease

name: EASTLINE
feature: Eastline (Pyraclostrobin 20% WG) is a high quality broad-spectrum fungicide that controls more than 50 major diceases that threaten yield and crop quality. Eastline helps prevent fungal diseases and provides protection to crops.
crops: Soyabean, cotton, banana, chilli, maize, tomato, groundnut
pests: Early blight, late blight, fruit spot, leaf spot, sheath blight, tick disease.

name: ENJO-MYCIN
feature: Enjomycin (Validamycin 3% L) is an antibiotic fungicide that controls rice sheath blight disease very effectively. It acts on hyphae and destroys fungi through its contact action and controls the spread of diseases. Enjomycin is also most effective against soil-borne diseases and is used for the control of Rhizoctonia solani in rice. Enjomycin remains effective for a long time even after rainfall
pests: sheath blight

name: BACKUP
feature: Chlorothalonil in Backup - 75% WP is a broad-spectrum topical fungicide Chlorothalonil is a multi-site inhibitor that affects various enzymes and other metabolic processes in fungi. It is toxic to fungal cells
crops: Grapes, Groundnut, Potato, Chilli, Cabbage, Watermelon
pests: Downy mildew, sheath spot, fruit rot, tick disease

name: ENJOSULF DP
feature: Enzosulph-dp is a contact fungicide containing 85% DP sulfur active ingredient
pests: Rust, Downy Mildew, Tikka

name: WEED BURN
feature: Weed Burn (glyphosate 41% SL) is a non-selective systemic herbicide of the organophosphorus group, which inhibits synthesis in weed plants. It controls annual and perennial weeds very effectively. After weed burn is sprayed, it is absorbed by weeds, plants and migrates to the roots and completely kills all types of weeds. It is also used to control weeds in cultivated crops, waterways, embankments and open fields. All kinds of green weeds can be controlled.

name: WEED BURN 71
feature: Widburn-71 is an ammonium salt type herbicide of glyphosate 71% S.G., a non-selective herbicide for the control of annual perennial, broadleaf and grassy weeds. When sprayed on leaves, Widburn-71 reaches plant roots and rhizomes through the process of transpiration, killing weeds below ground. Widburn-71 is very rapidly absorbed by weed plants and kills the plant at the root 7-12 days after spraying. It does not affect the germination of subsequent crops and any crop can be grown after its application

name: SAKRIP POWER
feature: Features and Benefits- Sacrip Power (Metsulfuron Methyl 20% WP) is a selective intercurrent herbicide, very effective in controlling a wide range of grasses, weeds and broadleaf weeds in wheat rice sugarcane. Sacrifice Power is rapidly absorbed by the plant's leaves and roots.

name: GOLU
feature: Golu (oxyfluorfen 23.5 ec) is a selective herbicide of the diphenyl-ether group. Golu forms a chemical barrier on the soil surface and affects weed plants through direct contact. It is used for the control of annual and grassy weeds in field crops

name: DENSO
feature: Denso (Clodinafop Propargyl 15% WP) is a post-emergence herbicide for the control of most important grass weeds in wheat

name: WEEDGO
feature: Weedgo (2,4-D Amine Salt 58% SL) is a selective post-emergence herbicide that effectively controls broadleaf weeds in various crops. It is absorbed by the leaves and stems of weeds, disrupting their growth and causing them to wither and die.

name: GLO POWER
feature: Glo Power (Glufosinate Ammonium 13.5% SL) is a non-selective post-emergence herbicide that effectively controls a wide range of grasses and broadleaf weeds. It acts by inhibiting the enzyme involved in the synthesis of amino acids, leading to the death of the treated plants.

name: DICLOQUAT
feature: Dicloquat (Paraquat Dichloride 24% SL) is a non-selective contact herbicide that controls a wide range of grasses and broadleaf weeds. It acts by disrupting the photosynthesis process in plants, leading to their death. It is commonly used for weed control in agricultural and non-agricultural areas.

name: METRINEX
feature: Metrinex (Metribuzin 70% WP) is a selective, intercurrent and topical herbicide of the triazinone group, which inhibits photosynthesis in the photo-system. It acts through roots and leaves and, therefore, is used for both pre- and post-emergence experiments. It controls narrow and broadleaf weeds.

name: ENJOZINE
feature: Enjozine is a herbicide containing Atrazine 50% WP. It is highly effective in controlling a wide range of grasses and broadleaf weeds. Enjozine acts by inhibiting photosynthesis in plants, leading to their death. It is commonly used for weed control in agricultural and non-agricultural areas. Enjozine is easy to apply and provides long-lasting weed control.

name: TRIACONEX
feature: Triaconex contains Tricontanol 0.1% EW It is a plant growth regulator. Tricontanol is a naturally occurring fatty alcohol, phytohormone or plant growth stimulant found in the cuticle and wax of plants. When used properly, tricontanol can significantly increase the amount of chlorophyll in leaves, resulting in an improved rate of photosynthesis. It is a non-toxic and eco-friendly formulation
crops: cotton, rice, fruits and leafy vegetables etc

name: ANGELS
feature: Paclobutrazol 40% SC synthesizes growth hormones in plants and influences developmental processes. Such retardants reduce shoot length and divert nutrients toward fruit and seed production. It also improves fruit maturity, fruit color and shape

name: TEJA PLUS
feature: Features and Benefits - Teja Plus is a highly effective plant growth regulator containing gibberellic acid 0.001% in liquid form as the active ingredient. Teja Plus works synergistically with plant metabolism and accelerates plant growth. Teja Plus also enhances the physical performance of the crop by stimulating hormonal and enzymatic activity. Teja Plus enables more photosynthesis during plants. Teja Plus also plays an important role in plant growth processes such as stem elongation, better flowering and grain/fruit formation along with grain/fruit maturation. Teja Plus compensates for micronutrient deficiencies.
crops: Crops- Rice, sugarcane, cotton, banana, groundnut, grapes, brinjal, okra, onion, cauliflower.

name: TEJA PRO
feature: Teja Pro is a plant growth regulator containing Gibberellic Acid 40% WSG as the active ingredient. It is specifically designed to promote plant growth and development. Tejo Pro stimulates cell elongation, resulting in increased stem and leaf growth. It also enhances flowering and fruiting, leading to improved crop yield. Tejo Pro is easy to apply and provides effective results in promoting plant growth and productivity.

name: ETHENOX
feature: Ethanox (Ethephon 39% SL) is a systemic plant growth regulator of the phosphonate family. It is easily absorbed by the plant and releases ethylene which is a natural plant hormone. Ethylene directly influences many physiological processes (ripening, ripening, etc.) and stimulates endogenous ethylene production. Ethanox is used in fruits and vegetables to stimulate flowering and side branching and to reduce plant height and fruit ripening
crops: Mango, Coffee, Pineapple, Tomato and Pomegranate

name: PACLOSTAR
feature: Paclostar (Paclobutrazol 23% SC) is one of the widely used plant growth regulators especially for mango. Mainly, the role of paclobutrazol is to inhibit gibberellin synthesis and promote flowering and fruiting. Thus, vegetative growth is reduced and assimilates are transferred to reproductive organs and production capacity is increased

name: HUMIGRAN-G
feature: Humigran-G is a bio-organic granule. Humigran-G enhances the quality of the crop by accelerating the growth of seedlings, root growth. Accelerates vegetative and reproductive growth of the crop. Being natural and organic, it improves soil structure, improves water holding capacity and increases organic carbon. It is non-toxic and can be used with all types of fertilizers and other soil conditioners
ingredients: Humic Acid - 5%, Amino Acid - 2%, Sea Weed Extract - 2%.

name: ENJOZYME
feature: Enzozyme is in granule form and improves the quality of the crop by accelerating root growth. Being natural and organic, it improves soil structure, improves water holding capacity and increases organic carbon. It is non-toxic and can be used with all types of fertilizers and other soil conditioners
ingredients: Humic Acid - 5%, Amino Acid - 2%, Seaweed Extract - 10%.

name: Supreem G-40
feature: Supreem G-40 for Spray is a special granular plant growth regulator that is a useful flowering stimulant for crops. Also increase in number of vines, increase in vegetative growth, increase in number of flowers, overall plant growth with root development are all benefits of Supreem G-40

name: SILCARE SOIL
feature: Silcare Soil (Diatomite silicon) is useful for increasing silicon biomass and essential nutrients. It also protects the plant from fungal diseases, insects and pests by strengthening the cell walls. Improves plant vigor, health and productivity. Improves drought and frost resistance. Protects against biotic and abiotic stress.
packingSize: 10 kg and 20 kg - Bucket, 250 g,500 g, 1 kg spray

name: E-CHARGE
feature: E-Charge is a natural biostimulant designed to enhance productivity by stimulating peak performance. It contains biologically active compounds that act as stimulants through specific processes involving amino acids derived from biotic enzymes, resulting in a significant increase in crop productivity. Additionally, it promotes healthy and rapid growth in the number of flowers.
crops: Oilseeds, pulses, cotton, cereals, fruit crops, vegetables.
dosage: 1 ml per liter of water for foliar application

name: ENJOSTIM
feature: Enjostim improves the general health and biochemical characteristics of the crop. Application of Enzostim has been shown to have a stimulating effect on cell size and cell growth in fruit crops. Enzostim is a basic organic biostimulant, anti-stress. Enzostim is useful for more reproductive flower growth, better fruit setting, improved fruit quality and increased sugar content
ingredients: Amino Acids- 3000 ppm, Protein-1%, Plant Extracts- 500 ppm
crops: Oilseeds, pulses, cotton, cereals, fruit crops, vegetables
dosage: 2 ml per liter of water for spraying

name: ALEX L-20
feature: Alex L-20 is a unique and highly effective combination of vitamins and proteins. It promotes flower growth and reduces flower drop. Improves fruit quality, and increases resistance against extreme temperatures, high humidity, frost, insect attack and natural wilt. Application during seed germination, flowering and fruit set stages of all crops significantly increases yield
crops: Oilseeds, pulses, cotton, cereals, fruit crops, vegetables
dosage: 0.5 ml per liter of water for spraying

name: AMILOX-33
feature: Amilox-33 promotes plant physiological activity and healthy plant growth. Application of amilox-33 before, during and after stressful conditions develops resistance to environmental stress. amilox-33 increases pollination and fruit formation. amilox-33 of these amino acids act as phytohormones and growth activators, thereby producing auxins
dosage: 2 ml per liter of water for spraying

name: Supreem-L40
feature: Supreem L-40 is a unique flowering stimulant, yield enhancer and plant protectant. Supreem L-40 is a research product based on nitrobenzene, containing nitrobenzene and additional ingredients such as silica absorbent plant protection. Supreem L-40 also increases vegetative growth, and reduces flower and fruit drop
dosage: 2 ml per liter of water for spraying

name: HUMIFLEX
feature: Benefits of Humiflex Plus: White root development and nutrient uptake by the plant. Improve soil fertility by influencing water holding capacity, increase plant sugar (Brix) levels, help plant resistance to disease and insect attack. Protect the plant from chlorosis, increase photosynthesis, vegetative growth, resulting in higher yield and healthy crops
dosage: 1 to 2 kg  with 200 ltr of water for 1 acre

name: K CATCH
feature: K Catch is a plant growth regulator formulated with natural botanical extract. It enhances the overall growth and development of plants by promoting root development, nutrient absorption, and stress tolerance. K Catch improves plant vigor, increases yield potential, and enhances the plant's ability to withstand adverse environmental conditions.

name: E-HUMIGRO
feature: E-Humigro is a mixture of humic acid and seaweed. It greatly accelerates root growth and vigorous plant germination. It also improves the uptake of micro and macro nutrients and helps to resist drought conditions and make them strong
dosage: 3 ml per liter of water for spraying 1L per acre for drip irrigation

name: ENJOWET
feature: Enjowet is an effective silicone based non ionic sticker. enjowet All Kinds of Agrochemicals viz. Can be used effectively and compatible with pesticides, fertilizers and plant growth regulators. enjowet promotes reduced spray volume by improving spray coverage. enjowet is useful for rapid spreading and increased penetration when spraying
dosage: 0.1 to 0.5 ml per ltr of water

name: LEADEX
feature: leadex is a protein based biostimulants product of natural origin. leadex contains a balanced ratio of short chain peptides, long chain peptides and free amino acids. leadex is quickly absorbed and transported by the plant, it activates basic enzyme systems, reducing energy loss. It helps in creating a balance of hormones that favor reproductive activity, fruit set and ripening
dosage: 2 ml in 1 ltr of water, 1 ltr per acre at critical stage

name: ENJOMIN-40
feature: Enjomin-40 is a natural alexin mixed with a phosphorus compound and a unique organic biostimulant that induces resistance in the plant system, besides providing systemic protection against fungi such as Downy Mildew, Phytophthora and Pythium
dosage: 2 ml per liter of water for spraying, 1 per acre for drip irrigation

name: ALEX
feature: The use of Alex increases flower and fruit set, as well as the formation of more branches in the plant, the color and taste of fruits and vegetables are increased and the yield is increased
ingredients: Constituents- Organic Content- 44%, Lignin- 5%, Amino Acids- 16%
crops: Oilseeds, pulses, cotton, cereals, fruit crops, vegetables

name: TARZAN
feature: Tarzan is a natural insecticide based on the flower and leaf extract of natural plants like Stomona root, Langdu root, Fructus cnidii, Tarzan is effective against bollworm complex like Heliothisis and Spodoptera
packingSize: Packing Size- 25 ml, 50 ml, 100 ml, 250 ml,
dosage: Dosage- 0.4 ml per liter of water for spraying

name: BACTOGUARD
feature: Bactoguard is a natural anti-bacterial and it induces immunity against bacterial diseases like leaf blight, black arm, canker, angular leaf spot, seedling blight etc. in cotton, citrus, rice, chilli, vegetables, flowers, ginger, tomato, onion, pomegranate

name: ANEX-BORDO
feature: Anex Bordo mixture is mainly used in orchards, vineyards, nurseries and fields to control fungal infections, primary downy mildew, as well as fungal infections on grape vines. The copper ions of Bordeaux mixture affect the enzymes in the fungal spores in such a way that the fungus inhibits germination. This means that the mixture needs to be applied before the outbreak of fungal diseases
dosage: 3 grams per liter of water for spraying

name: BIO STIKCY TRAPS
dosage: 50-150 traps per acre depending on plant population
pests: White Flies, Aphids, Thrips, Fruit Flies, Jassids, Leaf Hoppers, Leaf miners and Moths
feature: BIO STICKY TRAPS (Jumbo) 3MM are highly effective insect killers specifically designed for sucking pests. These traps utilize a sticky surface to capture pests such as White Flies, Aphids, Thrips, Fruit Flies, Jassids, Leaf Hoppers, Leaf miners, and Moths. They come in a convenient packing size of 10 pieces or 25 pieces. With a dosage recommendation of 50-150 traps per acre, depending on the plant population, these traps provide a reliable and eco-friendly solution for pest management.

name: FLYKILLER GLASS
feature: The fly killer is high efficiency, economical, eco-friendly and best for effective control of all major fruit flies affecting orchards, flower gardens, vegetables, nurseries etc. Cut open the pack of fly killer and avoid touching the fly with your bare hands. Hang this lure in a scientifically designed catch trap, change the piece of lure once in 45 days for effective control

name: ENJOFERT
feature: Enjofert is a balanced multi-micronutrient product in liquid form. Enjofert effectively supplies all the essential trace elements to the crop to produce fast, healthy growth with high yields. Enjofert helps in proper application of NPK fertilizers. Enzofert increases chlorophyll synthesis which produces more food for plants.

name: ANEX-D
feature: Annex-D is a mixture of water soluble micronutrients and is a well-balanced mixture of essential micronutrients as per the standards approved by the state government. Annex-D provides important micronutrients required by plants. The use of Annex-D increases the availability and absorption of other major and secondary essential nutrients. Annex-D improves flower aroma and fruit color, fruit size. Annex-D is specially formulated for drip and should be applied by drip only.

name: ANEX-COMBI
feature: Anex-combi increases the availability of micronutrients to crops, as well as increasing the nutrient carrying capacity of crops. Anex-combi improves the activity of photosynthesis by increasing the amount of chlorophyll. Anex-Combi is useful in overcoming micronutrient deficiency which develops resistance against pests and traces. Anex-combi increases flowering and fruiting and maximizes yield.

name: ENJOFERT SOIL
feature: Enzofert soil is a well-balanced mixture of essential micronutrients. Enzofert Soil provides important micronutrients that plants need. Enzofert soil application increases the availability and uptake of other major and secondary essential nutrients. Enjofert Soil helps plants grow healthy and well. Enzofert soil improves flower fragrance, fruit color, fruit size.

name: ZINBOR
feature: ZINBOR is a micronutrient blend fertilizer recommended for spraying on acid soil crops in Maharashtra state. ZINBOR is in a fully chelated form. ZINBOR is used as a fertilizer to overcome zinc and boron deficiency in plants and it also improves crop growth.
crops: Oilseeds, pulses, cotton, cereals, fruit crops, tuber crops, vegetables
dosage: 2 ml per liter of water for spraying

name: CALFLOW
feature: Calflow (Concentrated Liquid Calcium 11%) is a liquid calcium fertilizer that is readily absorbed by the crop. Provides strength to plant tissues, plays an important role in cell wall formation. Improves absorption of nitrogen, iron, zinc, copper and manganese. Promotes early root development and plant growth. Improves flowering and fruit set Improves immunity against pests and diseases.
dosage: 1 ml per liter of water for spraying 500 ml per acre for drip irrigation

name: ZINCFLOW
feature: Zincflow (ZINC-OXIDE-39.5% SC) is a micronutrient fertilizer with a high concentration of zinc. The main function of Zincflow is to assist plants in increasing chlorophyll content, thereby aiding in photosynthesis. Additionally, zinc is used for starch conversion and carb synthesis. Zincflow helps in enzymatic processes related to the digestion and assimilation of nitrogen by plants.
dosage: 1.5 ml per liter of water for spraying 500 ml per acre for drip irrigation

name: ENJOBOR
feature: Enzobor (Boran Ethanolamine B-10%) is a liquid boron that is readily available to the crop. It is used to stimulate the growth of cambium tissue and apical meristems, promote calcium mobilization and absorption, and promote pollen production and fertilization. It improves auxin metabolism and development of seeds and fruits.
dosage: 2 ml per liter of water for spraying 500 ml per acre for drip irrigation

name: ANEX-B
feature: Anex-B contains 20% boron as an element. Boron is a micronutrient that plants need for their health and growth. Some of the symptoms shown by crops suffering from boron deficiency are failure to flower, stunted fruit development, fruit and tuber rot, wilting and curling. Annex-B is used for growth of new cells, formation of flowers and fruits, development of roots

name: ANEX-ZN
feature: Anex-ZN is an EDTA complex containing at least 12% zinc. Annex-Z is used as a fertilizer to overcome zinc deficiency in crops. Anex-Z plays an important role in flower production, fruit setting and seed setting. Annex-Z is 100% water soluble.
crops: Oilseeds, pulses, cotton, cereals, fruit crops, tuber crops, vegetables
dosage: For spraying - 1 gram per liter of water For drip irrigation - 500 per acre

name: ANEX-FE
feature: Anex-F contains 12% of ferrous EDTA in chelated form. Iron is a micronutrient essential for plant growth, the most effective source for iron deficiency in all crops, being chelated it is easily absorbed by plants. It is important for oxidation processes in plant cells and for improving the content of proteins, tannins, sugars and lipids in plants, seeds.
ingredients: 12% of ferrous EDTA in chelated form
dosage: For spraying – 0.5 g per liter of water

name: ANEX MAGNET
feature: Anex-Magnet contains magnesium sulphate which is a secondary nutrient and is used to correct magnesium and sulfur deficiency in soil. It helps in the growth of new branches of the crops and also improves the absorption of nitrogen and phosphorus by the crops and keeps the crops green by increasing the chlorophyll content.
dosage: 5 grams per liter of water for spraying 50 kg per acre for field

name: ENJOSULF PLUS
feature: Enzosulph Plus (Sulphur 90% WDG) is a sulfur fertilizer formulated to facilitate fusigation. Sulfur plays an important role in the synthesis of proteins, oils and vitamins and in the formation of chlorophyll. Enzosulfa Plus is very beneficial for oilseeds, pulses, cotton, sugarcane, cereals, fruit crops, tuber crops, vegetables and plantation crops etc.
crops: Oilseeds, pulses, cotton, sugarcane, cereals, fruit crops, tuber crops, vegetables and plantation crops.

name: ANEX GOLD KIT
feature: Application of Anex God Kit corrects micronutrient deficiency in the soil and provides complete nutrients to the crop. The humic acid, amino acid present in it helps in the development and growth of plant roots. Magnesium Sulphate, Zinc Sulphate, Boric Acid, Ferrous Sulphate, Magnesium Sulphate, in proper quantity increase the rate of photosynthesis in the crop. By increasing the immune system in the crop, the crop becomes stronger and less susceptible to diseases. There is no need to give nutrients from time to time.
ingredients: Magnesium Sulphate, Zinc Sulphate, Boric Acid, Ferrous Sulphate, Manganese Sulphate, Silicon, Humic Acid, Amino Acid

name: ANEX N-SET
dosage: 100 gm pouch in powder form should be given using drip irrigation
feature: ANEX N-SET is a bio-fertilizer containing Azotobactor. It helps in nitrogen fixation and improves soil fertility. It promotes root growth and enhances nutrient uptake by plants. ANEX N-SET is suitable for use with drip irrigation and comes in packing sizes of 1 ltr and 5 ltr.

name: ANEX RHIZO-N
dosage: 100 gm pouch in powder form should be given using drip irrigation
feature: ANEX RHIZO-N is a bio-fertilizer containing Rhizobium. It helps in nitrogen fixation and improves soil fertility. It promotes root growth and enhances nutrient uptake by plants. ANEX RHIZO-N is suitable for use with drip irrigation and comes in packing sizes of 1 ltr and 5 ltr.

name: ANEX K-STORE
dosage: 100 gm pouch in powder form should be given using drip irrigation
feature: ANEX K-STORE is a bio-fertilizer containing potash catalysed bacteria. It helps in improving potassium availability in the soil and enhances plant growth and development. ANEX K-STORE is suitable for use with drip irrigation and comes in packing sizes of 1 ltr and 5 ltr.

name: ANEX BIO-ZN
dosage: 100 gm pouch in powder form should be given using drip irrigation
feature: ANEX BIO-ZN is a bio-fertilizer containing Soluble Dissolving Bacteria. It helps in improving zinc availability in the soil and enhances plant growth and development. ANEX BIO-ZN is suitable for use with drip irrigation and comes in packing sizes of 1 ltr and 5 ltr.

name: ANEX P-BOOST
dosage: 100 gm pouch in powder form should be given using drip irrigation
feature: ANEX P-BOOST is a bio-fertilizer containing Phosphorus Solubilizing Bacteria. It helps in improving phosphorus availability in the soil and enhances plant growth and development. ANEX P-BOOST is suitable for use with drip irrigation and comes in packing sizes of 1 ltr and 5 ltr.

name: ANEX MYCO GOLD GR
feature: ANEX Mycogold GR in agriculture improves soil structure, moisture retention, promotes root growth and provides plant nutrients including N, P, K, Mg, S and micronutrients. Contributes to increasing water uptake by plants, thereby improving soil characteristics by increasing microbial activity. It becomes more fertile and provides an increased amount of nutrients to the plant, thereby increasing the photosynthetic activity of the crop, as well as increasing disease and pest resistance in the crop.
crops: Oilseeds, Pulses, Cotton, Sugarcane, Cereals, Fruit Crops, Tuber Crops, Vegetables and Cultivated Crops

name: ANEX-MN
feature: Anex-MN contains 12% manganese in EDTA chelated form. Manganese aids in photosynthesis, carbohydrate and metabolism, as well as the transport of other nutrient ions. Manganese increases the resistance to the multiplication of viruses in the plant system.
dosage: For spraying – 0.5 g per liter of water
